HomeTextP: Enjoy creating websites and applications. I love learning new technologies, constantly improving my skills, and exploring innovative solutions.
AboutMeP: I am a 19 years old software engineer graduated from UCENFOTEC, passionate about developing and implementing innovative technological solutions. During my academic training, I acquired solid knowledge in various languages and technologies such as JavaScript, Java, C#, Python, CSS, HTML, SQL, and NoSQL. Although I have no professional work experience yet, I have worked on several academic and personal projects that have allowed me to develop practical skills and an analytical approach to solving complex problems.
